body:
In ya'll don't know my story, I was banned for three years and just came back for nostalgic sakes.

Ask me anything ;}
body_tagged:

title: AMA Cow

replies.body: Welcome back :) what is your favorite animal?
replies.body_tagged: Welcome back :) what is your favorite animal?

replies.body:
Hey.

How did you find Avicus in the first place? What's your favourite map? What's your favourite thing about Avicus?
replies.body_tagged:
Hey.

How did you find Avicus in the first place? What's your favourite map? What's your favourite thing about Avicus?

replies.body:
My favorite animal is a cow, obviously. <3

I found Avicus when it was not Avicus and Walls was a thing. My favourite map is Checkmate. (The map is gone now.) My favorite thing about Avicus is the community and how close it is to the staff which was not a thing three years ago.
replies.body_tagged:
